description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow replacement of the basement staircase with ground floor bridge to the rear garden. The covering of rear lightwells with retractable glass roof. Internal alterations to incorporate an additional bedroom to each dwelling in relation to planning permission reference 234508FUL dated 27/09/2024 for 'Construction of two semi-detached, two-storey dwellinghouses (following demolition of the existing semi-detached dwelling) incorporating basement and roofspace accommodation; and provision of associated private amenity space, cycle parking and refuse/recycling storage '
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):

Planning Statement, Approved Drawings (21-040-P02 Rev A, 21-040-P03 Rev A, 21-040-P10 Rev A, 21-040-P11 Rev A), Proposed Drawings (21-040-P02 Rev B, 21-040-P03 Rev B, 21-040-P10 Rev B, 21-040-P11 Rev B)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
